content.question: Which of the following will lead to a decrease in a nationâ€™s money supply in a country where the banking system has limited reserves?

choices.label: A decrease in income tax rates
A decrease in the discount rate
An open market purchase of government securities by the central bank
An increase in government expenditures on goods and services

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
